question: What is the call address of the UNTLK function?
What is the purpose of the UNTLK function?
What registers are affected by the UNTLK function?
What is the stack requirement for the UNTLK function?
What is the error return for the UNTLK function?
What is the description of the UNTLK function?
answer: This routine transmits an UNTALK command on the serial bus.

question: What devices will stop sending data when the UNTLK command is received?
answer: All devices previously set to TALK
